name: Firebois
author: midfree
notes:
Hazy just because i wanted quick wins!!!
Second gyokkou could be clutch agaisnt all the wall of D.
Second vassal could help!
Or the earth ninja!
Auto loss against first turn Sea steatlh attack, but very good agaisnt everything else.
5straight were, hazy, Caffira, glads, aromage, destiny draw control.
Otk as quickly as you can!
Took about 40wins from log1 to KoG.
